org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.visitor.as

Class ASNodeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.visitor.as.ASNodeHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IASNodeStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeforeAfterStrategy

    public class ASNodeHandler
extends Object
implements IASNodeStrategy
    A concrete implementation of the IASNodeStrategy that allows a subclass to either implement the IASNode handling directly or pass a child IASNodeStrategy that this class will delegate it's handle(IASNode) method to.
    Author:
    Michael Schmalle
    See Also:
    BeforeAfterStrategy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ASNodeHandler()
      Constructor, used when this handler directly implements handle(IASNode) and does not composite a child IASNodeStrategy.
      ASNodeHandler(IASNodeStrategy handler)
      Constructor, creates a node strategy that composites a child IASNodeStrategy implemented in the handle(IASNode) method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IASNodeStrategy getHandler()
      Returns the IASNodeStrategy currently being used to handle IASNode AST.
      void handle(IASNode node)
      The strategy will handle the specific IASNode.
      void setHandler(IASNodeStrategy handler)
      Sets the IASNode handler strategy.

        public ASNodeHandler(IASNodeStrategy handler)
